short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly find products from locally owned small businesses in BC without changing your search habits! Shopping locally made simple.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We compare your search results on Amazon, Etsy, and Walmart with the local BC market and in two clicks you are transported from e-commerce giants to locally owned small businesses who have the same or similar products available.

Want a way to give back and support your own community? Interested in learning about the environmental, social, and economic impact of your purchases?

If any of those points stir your emotions, you’ll love Locality.

Unique small businesses make each of our communities special. They support our little league baseball and soccer teams, contribute to community initiatives that make our homes a better place, and have a smaller environmental footprint compared to giant corporations.

Locality aims to help keep our homes happy, vibrant, and healthy. 

We’re neighbours, a community, a family, and you’re invited.
